Articles.Content:
Goodday everyone,

I play KSP for 1 weeks now and I love it. Not very good at it though yet, only managaed to get a probe in orbit of the Mun, but I am still learning.

Till next time

I would also like to say Hello mates!! Picked this gem up on Steam deal! Well to be fair after hearing about this game for weeks, I waited for a green light sale.

WoW, this game is awesome!! Took me about 15 tries to make orbit. Now if I can figure out a circular orbit!!
